channel.title: UT2003 mapping
channel.description: Anything related to the new UT2003 engine.

item.title: I die when i start
item.author: invalid@example.com (Helgso)
item.dc:creator: Helgso
item.content:encoded:
I was just finishing map and when i test it then i start and die instantly.
i have do "build all" and the player start is not in any wall. How can i fix it?

item.title: Unreal 2 / UnrealEd 3.0 problems
item.author: invalid@example.com (D-Rail)
item.dc:creator: D-Rail
item.content:encoded: I Have Ureal 2 and of course it came with U Ed 3.0. So I have been trying to use the terrain editing tool and when I hit the new button a window pops up that says not implemented yet. Why is this? Any help would be great.

item.title: Mover Triggering and Trigger Triggering Mover
item.author: invalid@example.com (topcount345)
item.dc:creator: topcount345
item.content:encoded: Ok im a noob when it comes to mapping but i do know a bit. I am having trouble making a trigger trigger a mover then the mover trigger another mover. I don't know exactly how to do this yet it seems like i have tried 400 diffrent ways but its like they don't expect someone to want to do it.

item.title: Teleporter effects!!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (SuperSucka)
item.dc:creator: SuperSucka
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Just looking around maps and taking ideasfrom them.. im thinking HOW THE HELL THEY ARE DOING THAT COOL EFFECTS! *clears throat*

Look at the DM-Inferno map.. it has teleporter with lighting (not good in english) effects!! How can i make them? do someone have good tutorials for it?

item.title: Static Mesh placement, map flow.
item.author: invalid@example.com (JDCT)
item.dc:creator: JDCT
item.content:encoded:
So I started randomly putting together a map, and so far I have the bare bones done. What I really need some advice on, is static mesh placement. I know its probably more of a question of experience, but I can never make them look right... they always look out of place. Should I design the map around them meshes?

Anyway, like I said, I have the bare bones done, some meshes have been placed, no lights, no bot path, no sky box yet. I just need some advice first before I continue. Also, I...

Static Mesh placement, map flow.

item.title: Snow .. right .. but not in bulding
item.author: invalid@example.com (-\Zeta-)
item.dc:creator: -\Zeta-
item.content:encoded: i hate this ! .. i just leanrned how to put snow efect (XWHEATHER) and now .. there is somme snow when im inside a bulding .. YES i have zonned the zone but .. i checked 2 if there it was bad-zoned .. but the editor show diferant zone colors (mean its right ^_^) so then .. wtf i am soposed to do to clear snow in bulding HELP!!!

item.title: That´s about unreal 2!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (SuperSucka)
item.dc:creator: SuperSucka
item.content:encoded:
Hello again!

I have questions.. about unreal 2.. how cani make anyone to speak?? Do i need scripting? That was question one!

Question two: Can i get patch to u2 editor ´cause i dont have terrain editor in it! It says: "not implented yet" AND THAT SUCKS!!

item.title: Some sites to submit maps?
item.author: invalid@example.com (SuperSucka)
item.dc:creator: SuperSucka
item.content:encoded:
Well..
Question #1

I need some sites to submit maps! That was my problem..

Question #2

Can i make ceilings with terrain editor? it would be cool if can create caves with it!

item.title: Need help importing staticmeshes unreal ed.3.0
item.author: invalid@example.com (THEXFILES)
item.dc:creator: THEXFILES
item.content:encoded:
Im doing a map and have it almost all done, i have all my textures that i needed,learned how to change a .jpg to a pcx file and import to a utx folder i named mytextures.utx, now im to the point i need to import a few staticmeshes,problem is when i find a static mesh i want to use and import it into my map,save it before i close the map out , take the map file and my texture file to another machine to see how it loads -it wont load cause it says it needs that staticmesh package. well that...

Need help importing staticmeshes unreal ed.3.0

item.title: tutorial hunt
item.author: invalid@example.com (DeVaToX)
item.dc:creator: DeVaToX
item.content:encoded: iam on the hunt for good tutorials for the unrealed 3, Max , Maya and photoshop , if u got a good site with any of these post your url and with ur permission il link u on my linkage page

item.title: DM-Gallant][ new map for ut2k3
item.author: invalid@example.com (DeVaToX)
item.dc:creator: DeVaToX
item.content:encoded:
heres a new map almost finisehd for ut2k3 DM-Gallant][, Its a large castle built on vocanic land, ideal for about 12 to 16 players evrythings almost made up of static mesh's , quite a few places to go on it plenty of z axis fighting, can jump to all corner towers via jumppads,

heres a screenshot lemmi know what u think any feed back will be greatly appreciated
